about_the_game:
The “Last Days of Spring 2” Official Soundtrack features music composed and produced by Antonio Lorenzo Carino. Reunite with the feelings and memories through this empathetic story through the vivacious and charming music that served as the backdrop of this visual novel. Also included is the behind the scenes Director's Commentary taking you though the Last Days of Spring journey.

Track List:
01 - Resting at the Lodge
02 - Reunited with Friends
03 - Old Memories
04 - Chill Night
05 - Cannon Beach
06 - The Cave
07 - Reflections
08 - Stars over Oregon
09 - So Alone
10 - Love's Confession
11 - Return to Spring Days
12 - Journey's End
13 - Memories of Your Voice

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8 / 10.9 / 10.10 / 10.11 / 10.12
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8 / 10.9 / 10.10 / 10.11 / 10.12
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
